TestCaseMetaData.name: EDOS_2.3_1.1-M08_GU_M08_Update_reactivate
TestCaseMetaData.Description:
The originator of the eDOS is the Century Hospital Clinical Laboratory located at 2070 Test Park, Los Angeles, CA, 90067, CLIA: 24D9871327, phone number: (310) 461-3666. The Sender is the Century Hospital Clinical Laboratory LIS. The Receiver is Dr. Radon's Office EHR.
The Laboratory Test Compendium from Century Hospital Clinical Laboratory is a subset of their Directory of Services. It is based upon the most commonly ordered lab tests by Dr. Radon. This compendium is being used by Dr. Nicholas Radon's practice EHR to place orders electronically to Century Hospital's Clinical Laboratory. Century Hospital has made the following changes to their test compendium:
- Reactivated the Sedimentation Rate Test that was previously de-activated.
Century Hospital's LIS transmits the appropriate eDOS update messages with these changes to Dr. Radon's EHR.
TestCaseMetaData.PreCondition: EDOS_1.0_1.1-M08_New and EDOS_1.0_2.1-M10_New and EDOS_1.0_3.1-M04_New and EDOS_2.1_1.1-M08_deactivate and EDOS_2.1_2.1-M10_deactivate and EDOS_2.1_3.1-M04_deactivate have been uploaded.
TestCaseMetaData.TestObjectives: Demonstrate capability to support a M08 update message - action: reactivate. Demonstrate capability to support repeating fields in OM1-51 (Other Names), OM1-54 (Special Instructions), OM4-15 (Specimen Handling Code). Demonstrate capability to support repeating segments for OM4.
TestCaseMetaData.Comments: Update changes for reactivation of information about individual observations.
